name: Birdy Bite
description:
Nom nom! Eat little flocks of birds with dynamic flocking behaviour as a hungry hunter bird.

Watch the flocks form, and break them apart. Glide alongside, or hunt them all down. Play with intelligent flocking birds at your own pace. 

- Sophisticated "boid" AI results in smooth flocking behaviour

- Hand-crafted animations

- Relax to the vibes of chill music and nature sounds
